Introduction
This topic contains information on developing claims filed under 38 U.S.C. 1151, including
general information about claims filed under 38 U.S.C. 1151
possible sources of information about the incident
requesting information from the medical facility

quality assurance investigativeÂ reports

title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 6, Section A - Developing Claims Filed Under 38 U.S.C. 1151
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 6, Section A
